title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: 200g spaghetti, 100g guanciale (or pancetta), 2 large egg yolks, 50g Pecorino Romano cheese, Black pepper
instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti until al dente.
2. Crisp guanciale in a pan.
3. Whisk egg yolks, Pecorino, and pepper.
4. Combine pasta with guanciale fat, then egg mixture, adding pasta water for creaminess.
5. Stir in crispy guanciale and serve.

title: Spicy Chicken Tacos
ingredients: 500g chicken breast, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 bell pepper, Taco seasoning, Corn tortillas, Salsa, Guacamole, Sour cream
instructions:
1. Cook and shred chicken. Sauté onion, garlic, and bell pepper.
2. Add chicken and taco seasoning.
3. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with chicken mixture and desired toppings.

title: Butter Chicken
ingredients: 500g boneless chicken, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, Ginger-garlic paste, Butter, Cream, Cashews, Spices
instructions:
1. Marinate chicken. Cook onion and tomato puree with spices.
2. Add chicken and cook. Stir in butter, cream, and cashew paste.
3. Simmer until sauce thickens. Serve with naan or rice.

title: Vegetable Fried Rice
ingredients: 3 cups cooked rice, 1 cup mixed vegetables, 2 eggs, Soy sauce, Sesame oil, Ginger, Garlic, Green onions
instructions:
1. Heat oil in a wok. Add ginger, garlic, and vegetables; stir-fry.
2. Add scrambled eggs and rice.
3. Pour soy sauce and sesame oil. Stir-fry everything together. Garnish with green onions.

title: Classic Margherita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, San Marzano tomatoes, Fresh mozzarella, Fresh basil leaves, Olive oil, Salt
instructions:
1. Preheat oven with pizza stone. Stretch dough.
2. Spread crushed tomatoes, then add mozzarella and basil.
3. Drizzle with olive oil, sprinkle with salt. Bake until golden and bubbly.

title: Huevos Rancheros
ingredients: Corn tortillas, Fried eggs, Salsa ranchera, Avocado, Cilantro, Cheese
instructions:
1. Fry tortillas until crisp. Fry eggs.
2. Warm salsa ranchera. Place eggs on tortillas, top with salsa.
3. Garnish with avocado, cilantro, and cheese.

title: Chana Masala
ingredients: 1 can chickpeas, 1 onion, 1 tomato, Ginger, Garlic, Green chilies, Chana masala powder, Cumin, Coriander
instructions:
1. Sauté onion, ginger, garlic, and chilies. Add tomatoes and spices.
2. Add chickpeas and a little water. Simmer.
3. Garnish with fresh cilantro. Serve with rice or roti.

title: Pork and Chive Dumplings
ingredients: Ground pork, Chinese chives, Ginger, Soy sauce, Sesame oil, Dumpling wrappers
instructions:
1. Mix pork, chives, ginger, soy sauce, and sesame oil for filling.
2. Fill wrappers and fold into dumplings.
3. Boil or pan-fry until cooked. Serve with dipping sauce.

title: Classic Lasagna
ingredients: Lasagna noodles, Ground beef, Tomato sauce, Ricotta cheese, Mozzarella, Parmesan, Basil
instructions:
1. Brown beef, add tomato sauce. Cook noodles.
2. Layer noodles, ricotta, meat sauce, and cheeses.
3. Bake until bubbly and golden brown.

title: Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: Cooked chicken, Corn tortillas, Enchilada sauce, Cheddar cheese, Onion, Cilantro
instructions:
1. Fill tortillas with chicken and cheese, roll up.
2. Place in baking dish, cover with enchilada sauce and more cheese.
3. Bake until cheese is melted and bubbly. Garnish with onion and cilantro.

title: Gulab Jamun
ingredients: Milk solids (khoya), Flour, Baking soda, Sugar, Water (for syrup), Cardamom, Rose water
instructions:
1. Make a soft dough from milk solids and flour. Form into small balls.
2. Deep fry balls until golden brown. Prepare a sugar syrup with cardamom and rose water.
3. Soak fried balls in warm sugar syrup until soft and plump.

title: Kung Pao Chicken
ingredients: Chicken breast, Peanuts, Dried chilies, Sichuan peppercorns, Soy sauce, Vinegar, Sugar, Cornstarch, Green onions
instructions:
1. Marinate chicken. Prepare sauce. Stir-fry chilies and peppercorns.
2. Add chicken and cook. Stir in peanuts and sauce.
3. Garnish with green onions. Serve with rice.
